item.title: No worries
item.description: I just read this and thought it was worth to post it as a reminder of all of my false fears and stupidity. ItÂ´s a fleeting moment in the life of Steve Jobs, when he was still young with no money nor plans: We had very little money and no foreseeable prospects. One evening after we had splurged on dinner and a movie, we walked back to our car to discover a $25 parking ticket.
